resources.string:
Controlling Appliances using Raspberry Pi (CARI)

CARI has been developed by the students of Computer Department of A.V.Parekh Technical Institute under the proper guidance of Mr. Niraj R. Trivedi, faculty member of the college.
 This app can control home appliances and provides various electricity usage analysis in the form of graphs. It can also manage the users and restrict them to have access to particular appliance,room or house.

Developed By:
Sanjana B. Purohit
Mit K. Patel
Nitant N. Joshi

Guided By:
Niraj R. Trivedi
